author: GRACE GAREY, CO-FOUNDER OF WASTSI
content: If we didn't get these notifications through Zapier, we'd miss important information on how patient funding is going. It's saved us so much time.

author: PAUL JARVIS, DESIGNER & AUTHOR
content: I teach people how to sell their books online. The less code they need the better. Zapier eliminates the need for code.

author: OPHELIE LECHAT, HEAD OF PRODUCT AT SITEPOINT
content: Zapier quietly works in the background. My team is now using process to be more productive without even knowing it.
